basics.name: Mary Santabarbara
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

work.company: UH Manao School of Information & Computer Sciences
work.summary: Help Desk Assistant for the ICS department.
highlights: Troubleshoot any problems with user accounts or with lab computers.
Create user accounts for all of the students using the labs.
Updating each computer within the labs.
Create new images, and test  new softare.
Set up builds for ICS teachers and staff.
Keep the labs and office clean.

work.summary: Assistant for daily operations of the studio and Media Lab
highlights: Administer equipment loan program, following check in and check out procedures.
Train, test, and assist students in the use of lab equipment including video cameras, lights, audio, computer editing and other production equipment.
Assist in maintenance and cleaning of equipment and facilities.
Provide customer service and sell to the customer.
Follow through on store operation tasks
Maintain good visual displays and clean the store

volunteer.summary: The Kapolei Robitcs team goes to the neighboring elementary schools to introduce them to the fun of STEM!
highlights: Teach younger children the importance and fun of STEM
Show/Teach them how to drive the robot

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship for full-time students that have graduated from a public Hawaii high school, have a high school GPA of at least 3.0, and have met certain academic criteria.
